data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Nanjing, Jiangsu, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nanjing, Jiangsu, China

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Nanjing, Jiangsu, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Nanjing, Jiangsu, China.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Nanjing to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Nanjing, Jiangsu, China will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nanjing
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nanjing, Jiangsu, China.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Nanjing, Jiangsu, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Nanjing prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 605,007 believers in the county of Nanjing the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
